Package graphicalComponents

Class Summary
CenteredVerticalJPanel This was a convenience class created to quickly add components vertically and horizontally centered.
GraphList<E>  
HandGraph A component created which graphically displays all joints at the same time.
HandMeter This class is a component which displays the current state of a Hand.
JointMeter This class graphically represents a singe Joint as a vertical bar.
LloydsLethalLeftGUI This is the main GUI which interfaces with the user and connects with all of the logical components via the Controller class.
